full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## EZ113-240570: Western Constance Cove Remediation

### Notice Details

* **Notice Title**: Invitation to Qualify for EZ113-240570
* **Publication Date**: November 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 11, 2023 at 14:00:00

### Project Information

The government of Canada, represented by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking proposals for the remediation of contaminated sediment within the Western Constance Cove Work Site as part of the Western Constance Cove Remediation Project (WCCRP). 

This is an invitation to qualify tender, where the contractor must meet certain selection criteria to be considered eligible for this project. contractors will be evaluated on the basis of technical merit and price to determine the best value for the government.

### Key Requirements

The project involves the remediation of contaminated sediment located in Esquimalt Harbour on Vancouver Island, British Columbia, within the Canadian Forces Base – Esquimalt (CFB Esquimalt).

The contractor will be responsible for the following:

* Remediation of contaminated sediment within the Western Constance Cove Work Site
* Compliance with all relevant regulations and standards

### Eligibility Requirements

To be eligible, contractors must meet the following criteria:

* Have relevant experience and expertise in specialized sediment remediation
* Comply with all relevant regulations and standards
* Meet the selection criteria outlined in the tender documents

### Submissions and Evaluation Process

Submissions must be made on the Ariba Discovery platform. Proposals will be evaluated on a best value basis.

A mandatory site visit has been scheduled for December 5, 2023.

### Contract Details

* **Contract Period**: December 1, 2023 to June 15, 2024
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Tian Lam, (SPAC/PSPC), at tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. 

Check the Ariba Discovery platform for the full tender package and evaluation criteria.  [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18094263?extsite=MTgwOTQyNjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18094263?extsite=MTgw
